typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		obj_key as double,
		obj_sourceid as decimal(38,18),
		obj_object_name as string,
		obj_imo_number as decimal(38,18),
		obj_built_year as decimal(38,18),
		obj_flag_iso3_code as string,
		obj_status_code as string,
		obj_object_type_code as string,
		obj_object_type as string,
		obj_dwt as decimal(38,18),
		obj_fdwt as decimal(38,18),
		obj_gt as decimal(38,18),
		obj_breadth_extreme as decimal(38,18),
		obj_breadth_moulded as decimal(38,18),
		obj_depth as decimal(38,18),
		obj_hull_type_code as string,
		obj_num_of_decks as decimal(38,18),
		obj_num_of_total_tanks as decimal(38,18),
		obj_propulsion_code as string,
		obj_speed as decimal(38,18),
		obj_num_of_crew as decimal(38,18),
		obj_num_of_passengers as decimal(38,18),
		obj_cap_bale as decimal(38,18),
		obj_cap_car as decimal(38,18),
		obj_cap_trailer as decimal(38,18),
		obj_cap_gas as decimal(38,18),
		obj_cap_grain as decimal(38,18),
		obj_cap_liquid as decimal(38,18),
		obj_cap_teu as decimal(38,18),
		obj_num_of_hatches as decimal(38,18),
		obj_num_of_holds as decimal(38,18),
		obj_num_of_propellers as decimal(38,18),
		obj_propeller_type_code as string,
		obj_ship_builder as string,
		obj_date_construction_start as timestamp,
		obj_date_launch as timestamp,
		obj_date_construction_end as timestamp,
		obj_date_dead as timestamp,
		obj_class1_code as string,
		obj_class1 as string,
		obj_iceclass as string,
		obj_iceclasstext as string,
		obj_class2_code as string,
		obj_class2 as string,
		obj_pandi_club_code as string,
		obj_pandi_club as string,
		obj_total_kw as decimal(38,18),
		obj_rpm as decimal(38,18),
		obj_hp as decimal(38,18),
		obj_engine_builder as string,
		obj_engine_designation as string,
		obj_engine_designer as string,
		obj_num_of_cylinders as decimal(38,18),
		obj_cylinder_arrangement as string,
		obj_engine_type as string,
		obj_stroke_type as decimal(38,18),
		obj_fuel_type_code as string,
		obj_manager_code as decimal(38,18),
		obj_date_valid_from as timestamp,
		obj_date_valid_to as timestamp,
		obj_manager as string,
		obj_gbo_owner as string,
		obj_operator as string,
		obj_reg_owner as string,
		obj_gb_owner_country_desc as string,
		obj_gbo_owner_country as string,
		obj_manager_country_desc as string,
		obj_manager_country_code as string,
		obj_operator_country_desc as string,
		obj_operator_country_code as string,
		obj_reg_owner_country_desc as string,
		obj_reg_owner_country as string,
		obj_gard_objectid as string,
		obj_flag_iso3 as string,
		obj_status as string,
		obj_class3 as string,
		obj_class3_code as string,
		obj_m3 as string,
		obj_ship_builder_country as string,
		obj_service_speed as string,
		obj_length_overall as string,
		obj_hullid as string,
		obj_date_built as string,
		obj_propeller_type_desc as string,
		obj_hull_type as string,
		obj_propulsion as string,
		obj_material_build as string,
		last_updated_by as string,
		lloyds_vessel_id as decimal(38,18),
		obj_market_area_code as string,
		obj_market_area_desc as string,
		obj_market_area_country_code as string,
		obj_market_area_country_desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['Pre_Dim/pre_dim_object.parquet']) ~> preDimObject
preDimObject derive(top_key = 'ALL',
		top_description = 'All Objects') ~> derivedTopLevel
derivedTopLevel alterRow(upsertIf(!isNull(top_key))) ~> alterRow
alterRow sink(input(
		PK_KEY as string,
		CPT_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CPT_NUMBER as integer,
		INSERTED_BY as string,
		DATE_INSERTED as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dimObject
